column2: The middle class, which barely existed before this era, is coming to the fore and will forever change the face of our nation. And what people buy.
Private individuals are starting to have more money available to invest in their future, and are looking for ways to spend it.
What to do if you want to spend but don't have the cash? Simple! Get a loan!
More credit available for consumers allows them to spend more and stimulates our economy.
Banks are easing lending standards and making ever more loans available to our population.
Retirement funds are starting to become available, that allow us to save up for our old age without relying on our children for everything.
Adam Smith's The Wealth of Nations is the book that started it all.
New economic theories help us determine which actions are more or less beneficial, as judged by their utility.
Marx' writings have spurred many discussions and influenced the lives of many.
We're turning optimism about our economic future into a new way of life!
Capitalism is experiencing a revival in academic circles with more economists trying to refute the works of Marx and other socialist theorists.
The keynesian multiplier: cure for all our troubles or recipe for disaster? It will surely spur spending, but at what cost?
Freedom of trade has opened up our economy and allowed our people to be infinitely more productive.
Small advertising firms are touting goods as diverse as crop fertilizers or leisure rifles.

The concept of free time didn't really exist before the industrial revolution as most common people worked all day long for survival. Now our people earn more and have more time to spend on other activities. But that's not cheap!
Some factories are sending their employees on business trips with all expenses paid!
Now our companies are even offering accounts for business related expenses, encouraging the employees to spend more.
Being a consumer is a way of life now.
Corporations are becoming more powerful, and some have employees as loyal to it as to any state.
Our people have pride in their favorite brands, and won't settle for less.
Steam kettles are a good way to boil water, whether you want to make tea, or provide steam for an industrial process.
Power conversion is the key to our future. Is there a limit we can use it for?
Our clipper convoys can take people all over the world.
Steam turbines aren't just good for industrial ventures. We can use them for cruise ships, too!
Small scale electrical grids are becoming available, and where there's power, there's ways to use it to meet our needs and desires.
More machinery is becoming available for use by our citizens in their everyday occupations.
The expression “Keeping up with the Joneses” may not have existed in the 19th century, but the idea behind it surely did.
People keep consuming. As long as there are wants, there will be customers.
In this age there's enough of everything to go around. In our nation at least.
Guns are not just for fighting... many people enjoy a good hunt!
There's an ever bigger demand for coal, and home delivery services are coming on the market that allow our people to use coal to heat their homes and offices.
We're learning more and more ways of incorporating iron into our lives, both industrially and for consumer goods.
The steel can: a thing of simplicity and beauty that allows us to keep food for much longer.
More and more alloys have come on the market, allowing us to build superior goods for superior prices.
The age of steel is upon us, and there is no limit to what we can build with this miracle metal.
Early railroads were a far cry from the advanced lines of the modern age. Still, it beat using a horse and buggy.
Small scale railways are starting to offer vacations to our citizens.
Cheap vacations come within reach as our railway network expands, increasing consumer spending drastically.
As railways are getting cheaper, goods become more and more plentiful for the average citizen.
Enormous railway tracks crisscross the nation, bringing goods to all major cities and towns.
Small trucks are starting to transport goods around the country, bringing ever more goods into consumer's reach and further increasing demands.
Recent breakthroughs in medical sciences are spurring more consumer demand in pharmaceuticals, from salves and common potions to the most expensive miracle cures!
Who doesn't want some paint for their walls?
Parafin can be used for just about anything.
Science advancements have turned the art of smell into many delicious fragrances.
Figuring out what is important in life allows people to make better decisions, and free more money for investment and consumer spending.
Being frugal is more than a habit, it's a way of life.
Making a budget is hard. Sticking to one is harder still.
A man can never desire enough, can he?
Introspection helps you discover your deepest wants and desires.
Popular culture is encouraging our citizens to spend more and more money on goods as their standard of living rises.
Who needs to move a tank quickly when it can destroy anything it sees?
By using our limited battle experience we can set up small scale weapons manufacturies.
Expanding on our experience in matters of war we can improve output in making arms.
Using our substantial experience in warfare allows us to produce weapons more efficiently than less warlike nations.
We have perfected small arms manufacturing to an artform.
As artillery improved, so did its manufacture.
You see, the end of the barrel goes towards them,not us!
early production techniques were aided by increasing ship research.
The advent of Tank warfare led to a new school of thought-that impressive speed and superior positioning would win the day in military clashes
The awe-inspiring destructive capability of modern weaponry gave new credence to the School of Firepower.
With advanced warships came advanced supply output.
Ships with ever increasing naval ranges meant new methods of supply manufacture had to be devised.
New advances in mobile refueling soon gave way to new advances in naval supply production.
The massive cannons required on warships ultimately led to more improvements in artillery production overall.
column14: x, resulting in more stable and fruitful marital unions.

column2: As naval weaponry became larger and larger, so did its means of production.
Colonial ventures required arms production, but standard procedures often fell short. Thus, new methods were devised.
The modern armaments industry saw impressive gains in arms production.
Small scale coin minting is giving more uses for our gold and precious metal.
Banks are starting to issue their own coins made of gold and silver.
Why carry heavy gold coins around if you can use a paper note backed by gold in a vault? It also allows us to further leverage our reserves.
Inflation is becoming more and more common as our money supply is growing.
Because children are the future. And your retirement insurance
New psychological theory has further reinforced the importance of a stable family unit.
Coal-powered turbines, the very driving force behind the industrialization of the western world.
Understanding of genetics and the role it plays in biological traits has improved our medicine.
With natural power being harnessed to help process food, our people are taking the first small steps towards a culture of commercial consumption.
With George Stockton Berry's use of a steam engine in a combine harvester, the potential harvest of a single worker increased dramatically.
This treaty resolved several border disputes between the United States and the United Kingdom. In particular, it clearly established the border between Maine and New Brunswick.
This treaty resolved the Oregon boundary dispute between the United States and the United Kingdom. The two parties agreed to split the territory along the 49th parallel.
American settlement of northern Oregon territory is creating a political crisis. Attempts to peacefully resolve the Oregon boundary dispute have failed.
Poor decisions made at the Treasury Office have led to a dangerous surplus of money in the country. As the value of your currency is begins to tumble, the only option is a massive devaluation.
Upon discovering that no single person in the world has any money, they have all raided their grandparents stockings to get at those savings.
The economy has fallen into recession. Bankers are weeping everywhere.
Time for a speech about tightening belts.
The markets are bullish, and investments in industry are prospering.
The oppressive shackles of the western world must be thrown off. It is time for China to retake its rightful place as the center of the world!
Italy will be reunited sooner or later and, if that have to happen, why shouldn't be reunited under the lovely hand of god? But sadly we can't make it alone, and every help will come with it's price
Once again the french soldiers will come in handy and, once again, their protection will have a price
Sometimes, in order to achieve a greater good for it's sheeps, even a minister have to sign a pact with the Devil
During the past years our mighty country has grown strong, rich, with an unrivaled culture. Now it seems that everybody wants to be a part of the dream!

During the past years our mighty country has grown strong, rich, with an unrivaled culture. Now it seems that everybody wants to be a part of the dream!
During the past years your mighty kingdom has grown strong, rich, with an unrivaled culture. Now it seems that everybody wants to be a part of your dream!
We should seek french help to kick Austria out of Italy.
The 11th day of the April of 1867 at florence, by initiative of Cristoforo Negri the Italian Geographic Society was created. Should we spend our money onto this dream?
During the 1870 the italian company Rubattino managed to convince the local sultanate of Assab to sell them the city and into 1880 Assab became officially an italian land. Should we finance it?
In 1884, when the egyptian government fell under the British forces, Italy managed to buy the city of Massawa from the Great Britain. Should we buy Massawa?
During 1889, thanks to the sultanate of aden, Italy was able to take control of Somalia's coast. Should we pay for it?
It seems that in Turin someone had the funny idea to create an Automobile Factory... Should we finance them?
The Agro-pontino region into Lazio has allways been an inospitable place and a malary incubator, it's time to resolve this problem once and for all

La Fenice theater is one of the most important italian opera theaters. It's construction began over the ashes of the old San Benedetto Theater burned in 1774 during the June of 1790 and it was finally completed by May 1792 just to burn again in 1836. Should we build it again?
The city of Rome is a more fitting capital for our glorious nation.
Encouraging use of lifeboats on searfaring vessels drastically reduced deaths at sea and
column3: as a result, fishermen could produce far more easily than before.

column2: As coal became the engine of industrialization, it became more and more predominant at sea as well.
With new turbines added to trawlers across the country, who needs actual fishermen?
The age of Electricity has begun!
It is the destiny of the Belgian people to civilize the last remaining wilds of the world. To Africa!

The Force Publique was the official armed force of the Belgian-controlled Congo Free State. Though ostensibly formed to combat Arab Slavers, the soldiers were often used to enforce economic quotas with brutal punishment.
Lei Aurea, or the Golden Law, abolished slavery once and for all throughout Brazil. The law contained only two artices
column3: Slavery was to be abolished, and any previous ruling contradicting the first article was now void.

column2: The Afro-Brazillian people are becoming an inherent part of Brazillian culture. It is time for them to obtain a modicum of citizenship.
There has been a great deal of change in our country. It will take some time to sort things out, before business as usual can resume.

Our people live in a war-torn world. Constant aggression from all sides seeks to hem our great nation in. Only by embracing the magnificence of our armies will we be able to claim our rightful place in the world.
In our country, all men are created equal. It is time we fully embrace that maxim and throw off the shackle of iniquity!
Internal strife threatens to break this grand country apart at the seems. Our people clamor for a return to order-it is time to embrace it.
Our country ought to be a shining beacon of freedom for the huddled masses. Our egalitarianism ideals shall be admired throughout the world.
Man is born equal. Once our people endorse the ideal of equality, he will die equal as well.
Our people have long suffered under the yolk of oppression. It is time to slough off those shackles and embrace liberty!

In this frightening age, there is only one body of power strong enough to ensure the safety of the populace across the realm. If we were to embrace the Police State, we could finally eradicate the vestiges of rebellion.
Our culture is astounding. Our military might is unparalleled. Our industry is dazzling. Shouldn’t the rest of the world bask in our glory?
The Swiss have little interest in the wars of Europe.
The might of the Swiss army is such that we can repel our neighbors without difficulty. Our policy of neutrality is no longer necessary.

The Czecks are angered by their unequal status in our empire and are demanding equal treatment.  We can change the laws to address their concerns, but it will make us look weak before the world and anger the Hungarians who do not wish to lose their special status.

The Slovones are angered by their unequal status in our empire and are demanding equal treatment.  We can change the law to address their concerns but it will make us look weak before the world anger the Hungarians and Czecks who do not wish to lose their elevated status.  The Croats will be permanently alienated by our decision to favor the Slovones over them.

The Croatians are angered by their unequal status in our empire and are demanding equal treatment.  We can change the law to address their concerns but it will make us look weak before the world anger the Hungarians and Czecks who do not wish to lose their elevated status.  The Slovenes will be permanently alienated by our decision to favor the Croats over them.

A bright industrial future lies ahead for our glorious socialist nation!  We must relentlessly pour our sweat, toil and even blood into our industry and build our way to a glorious paradise.  By setting ambitious five year targets for industrial output we will focus the might of our people.

Counter revolutionary elements are lurking with our officer core, planning to usurp our bold leadership.  We must cut down these dogs before they have a chance to strike in order to safeguard our revolution.
Aren't trains a wonderful way to connect to the people?
We receive income from the Suez canal once per year.
A social philosophy which believes rural life is superior to urban life. Factories and industrialization of all kinds are to be discouraged.
